webscript.shortname: Add a Custom Reference instance to the specified record node
webscript.description:
Adds a custom reference instance to the specified node.

The body of the post should be in the form, e.g.
{
   "toNode" : "workspace://SpacesStore/12345678-abcd-1234-abcd-1234567890ab",
   "refId" : labelName OR source + "__" + target,
}
labelName OR (source__target) are used for bidirectional and parentchild references respectively
